name: Baby's First House Fire
description:
VERSION 0.2 IS OUT!
- Added menu.
- Added keyboard (one or two share) support.
- Added XBOX360 controller support.
- Added PS3 controller support.
- Tided axe animation and added feedback.
- Fixed game not ending properly when players die.

The house is on fire and babies need saving! Play this 4-PLAYER cooperative firefighting game with your pals! Wall-jump through the building and switch between various tools before the apartments come crashing down!

THIS GAME IS PROBABLY TOO HARD TO COMPLETE SINGLE PLAYER, BUT YOU'RE WELCOME TO TRY!

This game was created for TOJAM 2015 in 48 hours. It's still in a pretty rough state, but it can make for some intense baby-saving action! We'll update it soon with some polish and playability fixes.

Created by loft-games.com
With music by abstractionmusic.com
Check out my website adamgryu.com <3
